TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LegendItemOrder extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the order in which items are added to the legend.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, the chart determines the order in which items are added to the legend. All chart types except stacked area, stacked bar and stacked column charts will always place items in the legend in the same order as how items are ordered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SeriesCollection>. By default, stacked charts will always show items in the reversed order as how they are ordered in the series collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The chart automatically determines the order in which items are added to the legend.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder ReversedSeriesOrder = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Items are added to the legend in the reverse order of items added to the chart series.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemOrder SameAsSeriesOrder = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Items are added to the legend in the same order as items added to the chart series.
